1.text: Lay the bag down and smooth the bag out to remove air.

2.text: Fold the opening of the bag on top of itself.
2.vid: /e/e7/Close a Bag of Chips by Folding It Step 2 Version 4.360p.mp4

3.text: Continue folding the bag in 1–2 in (2.5–5.1 cm) layers.
3.vid: /6/61/Close a Bag of Chips by Folding It Step 3 Version 4.360p.mp4

4.text: Store the bag upside down on top of itself.

5.text: Lay the bag on a table and flatten the top to remove excess air.

6.text: Fold the top corners of the bag towards the middle so they meet.
6.vid: /8/82/Close a Bag of Chips by Folding It Step 6 Version 4.360p.mp4

7.text: Fold the top 1 in (2.5 cm) over the corners.
7.vid: /a/a0/Close a Bag of Chips by Folding It Step 7.360p.mp4

8.text: Continue folding the top of the bag until you have 2-3 layers.
8.vid: /f/fc/Close a Bag of Chips by Folding It Step 8.360p.mp4

9.text: Stick your thumbs into the corner flaps and invert the top of the bag.
9.vid: /7/7f/Close a Bag of Chips by Folding It Step 9.360p.mp4
